summary: Completed comprehensive testing of PomodoroTrack application. Backend APIs are fully functional with 100% success rate. Frontend registration and basic navigation work correctly, but found critical UI interaction issues with project selector dropdown.

ui_bugs.issue: HTML overlay intercepting pointer events prevents dropdown option selection
ui_bugs.impact: Blocks timer functionality as users cannot select projects

integration_issues.issue: 401 error when attempting login with test credentials

passed_tests: Basic UI layout and Spanish interface

success_percentage.frontend: 75% (major functionality works, but dropdown interaction blocked)

action_item_for_main_agent: Fix project selector dropdown overlay issue preventing option selection. The dropdown opens but HTML overlay intercepts clicks. Also investigate login credential persistence issue causing 401 errors for existing users.
